title: The Humility Gap (Lisa Harper)
description:
True humility isn’t about acknowledging what we lack, but acknowledging God’s ability to do more.

In “The Humility Gap” guest speaker Lisa Harper teaches us that when we humble ourselves, we leave room for God’s mercy to fill in our gaps.

If you’ve just made a decision for Christ, please respond HERE: http://ele.vc/tIepfr
